thread.title_full: Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you chills – Watch | Zee News

title: Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you chills – Watch | Zee News
text:
Rajkummar Rao's 'Trapped' trailer will give you chills – Watch By Zee Media Bureau | Last Updated: Friday, February 24, 2017 - 13:04 0 Follow @ZeeNews 
New Delhi: After winning critical acclaim for movies like 'Udaan' and 'Lootera', filmmaker Vikramaditya Motwane is back to take the silver screen by storm. This time, the 40-year-old director has joined forces with actor Rajkummar Rao for upcoming Bollywood film 'Trapped'. 
The trailer was recently released online and it is intriguing enough to give you chills. 
The story of 'Trapped' revolves around a man who is stuck inside an apartment of a non-functional building. He tries his level best to get noticed and escape but fails miserably. MUST READ
